info.title: vitrivr engine API
info.description: Rest API for the vitrivr engine project. Provides query (runtime) and extraction (ingestion) endpoints

get.summary: Lists the names of all available schemas.

parameters.name: schema
parameters.description: The schema this operation is for.

parameters.name: exporter
parameters.description: The exporter of the schema to use.

post.summary: Indexes an item, adding it to the defined schema.

parameters.name: schema
parameters.description: The name of the schema to execute a query for.

get.summary: Queries the status of a given ingest job.

parameters.name: schema
parameters.description: The name of the schema to execute a query for.

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: The id of the job to query the status for.

post.summary: Executes a query and returns the query's results.

parameters.name: schema
parameters.description: The name of the schema to execute a query for.
